subSections.text: {{Han simp|樣|f=羕|t=羊}} in the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}} by the People's Republic of China. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text: {{zh-see|樣}} <!-- Note: Did not exist as a variant form of 樣 prior to 1956 simplification. All printed references in Taiwan's Dictionary of Variant Characters indicate 「槌」 as its only definition. The statement 「樣」 之異體。 lacks proper citations. -->
